name: CHAMENEON (itch)
description:
This game prototype was made during the #AmazeMeGJ!

Switch the neon colors and surf your way to the end. A powerful virus has infected the Cyber Space and now is up to you to control a manual message called CHAMENEON.

Play in 80 stages, each one with 2 collectables to get!

Developed by: Felipe Araujo, Yuri Santos and Íris de Oliveira.

Free royalty music by: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
